hints.content:
On a clock there are two hands. The $\redD{\text{hour hand}}$ is the shorter hand.  The $\blueE{\text{minute hand}}$ is the longer hand.

![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 5. The long minute hand points to 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/45a764740b107b33cf6707c08fe70c7abdbda8c9)

$\redD{8}{:}{\blueE{50}}$ is $\blueE{50}$ ticks from $\redD{8}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is almost at 9. The long minute hand points to 10. Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8ff33e7c04493303c91f34c9c74807b7942a503e)

Notice the hour hand is past $8{:}00$ but not quite to $9{:}00$.

$\redD{7}{:}{\blueE{50}}$ is $\blueE{50}$ ticks from $\redD{7}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is almost at 8. The long minute hand points to 10. Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/52e9cc7f99d848f8adfa9c47697a8c4cdc98c3c3)

Notice the hour hand is past $7{:}00$ but not quite to $8{:}00$.

$\redD{9}{:}{\blueE{25}}$ is $\blueE{25}$ ticks from $\redD{9}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is between 9 and 10. The long minute hand points to 5. Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1603e5c4f2bcf48cf2c09765ac1e1f027a6e1819)

Here is the completed table:

Time | Clock
- | - | -
$8{:}50$ | ![A clock shows the short hour hand is almost at 9. The long minute hand points to 10.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1b4d797be105c8ed0d998c01b796899df37d38d3)
$7{:}50$ | ![A clock shows the short hour hand is almost at 8. The long minute hand points to 10.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ac283f269f3448d148320a3220366d0cf2ed7d25)
$9{:}25$ | ![A clock shows the short hour hand is between 9 and 10. The long minute hand points to 5.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f303b9038da4843c8a88e47913db428ca446fe9b)

question.content:
**Match the clocks to the correct time.**

[[â˜ƒ matcher 1]]

right: ![A clock shows the short hour hand is almost at 8. The long minute hand points to10.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1b4d797be105c8ed0d998c01b796899df37d38d3)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is almost at 9. The long minute hand points to 10.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ac283f269f3448d148320a3220366d0cf2ed7d25)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is between 9 and 10. The long minute hand points to 5.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f303b9038da4843c8a88e47913db428ca446fe9b)
